title: Lucifers Pizza - Los Feliz
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Pizza, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Established in 2008, this pizzeria caters to vegans by offering vegan crust and Daiya vegan cheese; has gluten-free crust. Choose your preferred degree of spicy, from mild to blazing. Cows recommend the zucha pizza vegan-style. Also a location on Melrose Ave, LA.
